Function Documentation

void csyr2k ( char  uplo,
char  trans,
int  n,
int  k,
complex  alpha,
complex *  a,
int  lda,
complex *  b,
int  ldb,
complex  beta,
complex *  c,
int  ldc 
)

csyr2k performs one of the symmetric rank 2k operations for single precision complex numbers:

C := alpha*A*B' + alpha*B*A' + beta*C or C := alpha*A'*B + alpha*B'*A + beta*C.

alpha and beta are scalars. A and B are n by k matrix in the first case and k by n matrix in the second case. C is an n by n symmetric matrix.

Parameters:
[in]uplospecifies whether upper or lower traingular part of C is referenced.
uplo = 'U' or 'u', upper traingular part of C is referenced.
uplo = 'L' or 'l', lower traingular part of C is referenced.
[in]transspecifies operation to be performed.
trans = 'N' or 'n', C := alpha*A*B' + alpha*B*A' + beta*C.
trans = 'T' or 't', C := alpha*A'*B + alpha*B'*A + beta*C.
[in]nspecifies the number of rows/columns of C.
[in]kspecifies the number of colums of A and B if trans = 'N' or 'n' or the number of rows of A and B if trans = 'T' or 't'.
[in]alphamultiplication factor on matrix product.
[in]apointer to matrix A.
[in]ldafirst dimension of A.
[in]bpointer to matrix B.
[in]ldbfirst dimension of B.
[in]betamultiplication factor on C.
[in,out]cpointer to matrix C.
[in]ldcfirst dimension of C.
void csyr2kSC ( char  uplo,
char  trans,
int  n,
int  k,
complex  alpha,
complex *  a,
int  lda,
complex *  b,
int  ldb,
complex  beta,
complex *  c,
int  ldc 
)

csyr2k performs one of the symmetric rank 2k operations for single precision complex numbers:

C := alpha*A*B' + alpha*B*A' + beta*C or C := alpha*A'*B + alpha*B'*A + beta*C.

alpha and beta are scalars. A and B are n by k matrix in the first case and k by n matrix in the second case. C is an n by n symmetric matrix.

Parameters:
[in]uplospecifies whether upper or lower traingular part of C is referenced.
uplo = 'U' or 'u', upper traingular part of C is referenced.
uplo = 'L' or 'l', lower traingular part of C is referenced.
[in]transspecifies operation to be performed.
trans = 'N' or 'n', C := alpha*A*B' + alpha*B*A' + beta*C.
trans = 'T' or 't', C := alpha*A'*B + alpha*B'*A + beta*C.
[in]nspecifies the number of rows/columns of C.
[in]kspecifies the number of colums of A and B if trans = 'N' or 'n' or the number of rows of A and B if trans = 'T' or 't'.
[in]alphamultiplication factor on matrix product.
[in]apointer to matrix A.
[in]ldafirst dimension of A.
[in]bpointer to matrix B.
[in]ldbfirst dimension of B.
[in]betamultiplication factor on C.
[in,out]cpointer to matrix C.
[in]ldcfirst dimension of C.

dsyr2k performs one of the symmetric rank 2k operations for double precision real numbers:

C := alpha*A*B' + alpha*B*A' + beta*C or C := alpha*A'*B + alpha*B'*A + beta*C.

alpha and beta are scalars. A and B are n by k matrix in the first case and k by n matrix in the second case. C is an n by n symmetric matrix.

Parameters:
[in]uplospecifies whether upper or lower traingular part of C is referenced.
uplo = 'U' or 'u', upper traingular part of C is referenced.
uplo = 'L' or 'l', lower traingular part of C is referenced.
[in]transspecifies operation to be performed.
trans = 'N' or 'n', C := alpha*A*B' + alpha*B*A' + beta*C.
trans = 'T' or 't', C := alpha*A'*B + alpha*B'*A + beta*C.
[in]nspecifies the number of rows/columns of C.
[in]kspecifies the number of colums of A and B if trans = 'N' or 'n' or the number of rows of A and B if trans = 'T' or 't'.
[in]alphamultiplication factor on matrix product.
[in]apointer to matrix A.
[in]ldafirst dimension of A.
[in]bpointer to matrix B.
[in]ldbfirst dimension of B.
[in]betamultiplication factor on C.
[in,out]cpointer to matrix C.
[in]ldcfirst dimension of C.

uplo = 'U' or 'u', upper traingular part of C is referenced.
uplo = 'L' or 'l', lower traingular part of C is referenced.

trans = 'N' or 'n', C := alpha*A*B' + alpha*B*A' + beta*C.
